mapper.select: SELECT teamPosition, concat(ROUND((COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zzz_datas_personal1 WHERE championName = #{champions}) * 100), 1),'%') AS linePick FROM zzz_datas_personal1 WHERE championName = #{champions} GROUP BY teamPosition ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3
select champion_name,champion_name_kr from champList where line like #{line} order by champion_name_kr
